name: ALL HANDS
description:
You are a nameless sailor aboard the trading ship Tragedy. It is no longer 1850, but it is not 1880 yet, and the world has taken on qualities that could be unfamiliar, but are not. Not to you.

ALL HANDS is a narrative twine game about the moon. 

Inspired by AMC's The Terror, Lucas Pope's Return of the Obra Dinn, Robert Eggers' The Lighthouse, Coil's album Musick To Play In The Dark (which contains lyrics quoted in the form of the Musician's Song), and my own lifelong obsessions with old timey men on boats having awful, homoerotic things happen to them.
